p: My name is Aligbe Grace, a Social Engineer from Delta State but born in Kano State. A trained facilitator, human resource officer, project manager and communicator. I love developing myself with new life skills as I am currently learning coding and web development. I love humanitarian service and I have volunteered for some community outreach program which mostly aims at children's health and wellbeing. Participated in conflict resolution and orientation in Plateau and Nassarawa States respectively.
Research, Reading, Facilitating, Traveling, Basketball, Old School Music Volunteering and web development.

p.strong: Adolescent Health and Information Project, Kano (AHIP)
Dept of Sociology/Anthropology Madonna University Okija

p.#text: Trained on Data Gathering using ODK Collect
